sourceOrganization.name: NIAID MHRP Program
sourceOrganization.description: The U.S. Military HIV Research Program (MHRP) was established to protect U.S. troops entering endemic HIV areas and is dedicated to HIV vaccine development, prevention, disease surveillance, and HIV care and treatment.  For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/military-hiv-research-program
alternateName: The U.S. Military HIV Research Program
